Virtual Reality Television: A television that immerses the viewer in a virtual world where they can interact with the characters and environment.
Augmented Reality Television: A television that overlays digital information on top of the real world, allowing viewers to see additional content and interact with it.
Holographic Television: A television that displays 3D images in mid-air, allowing viewers to see and interact with objects as if they were real.
Teleportation Television: A television that allows viewers to teleport to different locations and see events as they happen.
Time Travel Television: A television that allows viewers to travel back in time and see historical events as they unfolded.
